/unicluster/bl2x220Cluster/opt/gcc/gcc-6.3/bin/g++    -std=c++14       -Wl,--export-dynamic CMakeFiles/DG2D.dir/DG_MPI.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DG2D.dir/src/defs/defs.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DG2D.dir/src/Mesh/Mesh.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DG2D.dir/src/Mesh/Cell.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DG2D.dir/src/Mesh/Edge.cpp.o CMakeFiles/DG2D.dir/src/compService/compService.cpp.o  -o DG2D -rdynamic /usr/local/lib/libmpi_cxx.so /usr/local/lib/libmpi.so -ldl -lm -lrt -lnsl -lutil -lm -ldl -lrt -lnsl -lutil -Wl,-rpath,/usr/local/lib
